column4: It look less busy now so I'll ask again: I 've set my screensaver to never and the power management to never sleep in 10.04 but it continue to sleep after 15 minutes download or movie or game...
How can I disable monitor sleep?
try running the gnome-screensaver with --debug and check what it says.
so use gnome-screensave-command --quit or so to get rid of the running instance
